Articles.Content: I've been playing KSP for about 3 1/2 years now, browsing the forums for about two, so I guess it's time I got an account, no? ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)
Welcome aboard, finally! It's always good when we can hear from people who used to be lurkers.

With a name like that, we're going to be expecting pictures of explosions!

 ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

> 
> Welcome aboard, finally! It's always good when we can hear from people who used to be lurkers.

Thanks! The forums have lots of good info and ideas for ships/missions.

> 
> With a name like that, we're going to be expecting pictures of explosions!
>  ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

What do you think I've been doing for the past 3 years? ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif)
Welcome to the forums! Glad to have you aboard ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
